metadata.title: CVE-2020-36658 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Apache::Session::LDAP before 0.5, validity of the X.509 certificate isnot checked by default when connecting to remote LDAP backends, because thedefault configuration of the Net::LDAPS module for Perl is used. NOTE: thiscan, for example, be fixed in conjunction with the CVE-2020-16093 fix.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache-session-ldap-perl - 0.4-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache-session-ldap-perl package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.4-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
